parameters.name: Primary
parameters.description: Component identifier as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

parameters.name: Secondary
parameters.description: Component identifier(s) as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

parameters.name: Tertiary
parameters.description: Component identifier(s) as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

title: IFeatureManager.SetComponentIdentifiers
description: Allows you to specify the primary, ( secondary ), and < tertiary > elements to display for the components in the FeatureManager design tree.
signature:
System.Int32 SetComponentIdentifiers( 
   System.Int32
Primary
,
   System.Int32
Secondary
,
   System.Int32
Tertiary
)

parameters.name: Primary
parameters.description: Component identifier as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

parameters.name: Secondary
parameters.description: Component identifier(s) as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

parameters.name: Tertiary
parameters.description: Component identifier(s) as defined by swComponentIdentifier_e

returns: Result code as defined by swSetComponentIdentifierResult_e
remarks:
This method:
Works in both SOLIDWORKS Design and
SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented
.
Is analogous to right-clicking on the top-level component in the FeatureManager design tree and selecting
Tree Display > Component Name and Description
.
